name: VoxelRace
description:
Voxel Race is a small racing game completed for 2kPlus Jam in February 2020.

Play with arrows keys. Complete each track in a limited time to progress to the next one.
There are four environments with different conditions (cloud cover, time of day). Headlights are turned on automatically at night.
Offroad driving is slower yet can be a shortcut.

The game is pure 2D canvas (no webGL) and packs to a 2029b zip archive.
